The Page class is a container, which loads all of the elements that may appear on a loaded page.

Initializes the Object
Pmog.prototype.page_loaded = function(tab)
Once a page is loaded this function starts the process of preparing the page to receive overlay events.
Pmog.prototype.page_validated = function(type)
Page actions require a page object to be returned from the pmog server.
ObjectParser.prototype.parse_object = function(obj,
containing_property)
Create a recursive iteration over the objects and add them to a query string.
Pmog.prototype.parse_page_objects = function(opts)
The function iterates over the attributes of the obj sent by the server and stores them into a new istance of the Page class.
Tab.prototype.parse_selected_tab = function()
When a tab is loaded it notifies the Pmog class (only once).
Hud.prototype.parse_user_associations = function(xul,
user)
This function styles the childnodes of a xul element to match the player’s associations.
Hud.prototype.parse_xul = function()
Extract the location of important items of the hud into variables so that we only have to look them up once.
An simple implementation of the Mozilla SQLite Storage API wrapped in an ActiveRecord ‘like’ API.
function PassiveRecord(db_name)

Hud.prototype.pause = function()
Pause the game playback, hide the pmog toolbar and event windows.
Hud.prototype.play = function()
Resume play of the game and unhide the hidden pmog tools and event windows.
This class is the controller for the extension.

Initializes the Object
Hud.prototype.pmog_reset = function()
This function reboots PMOG as if the user just logged in.
This class handles the authentication, the storing and retrieving of local login credentials and session handling of Pmog players.

Initializes the Object
This class stores all the attributes needed by the player during the normal course of play.

Initializes the Object

This function opens a xul preference window.
preventAutoClose: function(event)
Prevents a XUL panel element from auto-hiding when it loses focus
Pmog.prototype.private_track_url = function()
This function will tell pmog.com, which webpage the user just loaded.
Pmog.prototype.private_url = function()
In order to balance the traffic on the server we make extension specific calls to ext.pmog.com
Hud.prototype.profile = function(event)
This function opens a browser window to the current player’s profile page.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.query_fragment = function(params)
Uses the options hash to create a query fragment used to create a complete sql statement.
Hud.prototype.register = function(event)
This function opens a browser window to pmog registration page.
TabObserver.prototype.reindexTabs = function()
Reindex the internal tab array to correspond with the indexs of their associated tabs in the Firefox tabbrowser array.
Page.prototype.remove_page_object_by_id = function(id)
This function will remove an item from the list of page objects
TabObserver.prototype.remove_tab = function(panel_id)
This method removes an existing instance of the Tab class that was associated with the Tab removed from the firefox browser.
removeItem: function(item)
Removes an item from the dock with animation
removeVolatile: function()
Removes any overlay that shouldn’t persist across page changes.
This function opens a xul window to submit a bug to pmog.
TinyAjax.prototype.request = function()
Initiates the XMLHTTP request to the server.

event)
This function handles requests made by other classes to deploy tools or execute other game related functionality.

Reset all the logins stored for the PMOG domain, and then log out.

Rollback any transaction currently in progress

user,
pass)

panel_id)

src)
This function updates the avatar area of the hud with the image returned by the remote server.

This function stores the chosen skin in a preference for later.
Hud.prototype.shoppe = function(event)
This function will open a tab in the browser to the shoppe url on the PMOG server.
Hud.prototype.show_all = function()
Show the entire pmog window and hide the login window.
Pmog.prototype.show_all_page_objects_for_page = function(the_page)
This function will render any overlays stashed in the provided page object to the screen.

event)
This function opens a browser to the association of the provided parameter.
Pmog.prototype.show_page_object_type = function(items,
panel_id)
Render a specific page object type to the display.
Hud.prototype.show_tools = function()
Once a player is authenticated by the server and an instance of the PmogUser class has been assigned, this method will show the tools in the hud.
showHidden: function()
Opens all the docks that are closed and re-renders their open overlays.
Hud.prototype.sign_out = function()
This function signs the user out of the extension and the website by making an asynchronous call to the pmog server.
Pmog.prototype.site_blocked = function(url)
Determine if a url appears in the blocked site list as defined by the white lists database

Function for removing extra white space off the beginning and end of a string From: http://blog.stevenlevithan.com/archives/faster-trim-javascript
Hud.prototype.switch_users = function(user)
This function logs the current user out and brings down the login box so that a user can log in as someone else.
